name: Identity Crisis
text:
You may flip to alter-ego form. Choose:
Exhaust Carol Danvers → remove Identity Crisis from the game.
Discard 1 [[persona]] support you control. If no support was discarded this way, this card gains surge. Discard this obligation.

name: Rogue Rivalry
text: Ms. Marvel has been targeted by Mystique. Acting impulsively, Rogue has decided to take matters into her own hands. Forced Response: After the villain phase begins, each player discards a random card from their hand. [crisis]

name: Rogue
text: Guard. Teamwork ([[brotherhood of mutants]]). Toughness. [star] Forced Response: After Rogue attacks you, discard a [energy] resource from your hand, if able. (Ms. Marvel’s nemesis minion.)

name: Mystique
text: Patrol. Teamwork ([[brotherhood of mutants]]). When Defeated: Choose to either spend a [mental] resource or confuse your identity. [star] Boost: You are confused.

name: Rogue Assault
text: When Revealed (Alter-Ego): Place threat on the main scheme equal to the total number of [energy] resources in your hand. When Revealed (Hero): Take indirect damage equal to the total number of [energy] resources in your hand.

name: Veiled Ambush
text: When Revealed (Alter-Ego): The villain schemes. Place 1 threat on each side scheme. When Revealed (Hero): The villain attacks you. Place 1 threat on each side scheme.
